title: Given Names
description:
Travel the End Trails - paths into hidden places, taking you towards the unknown and from which return is far from certain. Tales of things not believed from the comfort and safety of civilisation and only whispered about on the distant fringes of exploration, all waiting in the wilderness. In 
Given Names
, a Native American boy comes of age only to have the future he imagined snatched horribly away, leaving only doubt. No-one knows to what destination the path through life will lead - but one thing is for sure: you won't be the same person when you get there... The End Trails are stories to be told around the camp-fire, dark things to unsettle the mind, before you settle down to sleep.
author: Andrew Leon Hudson
